original_text: But after they had rest they did evil again before you, and you abandoned them to the hand of their enemies, so that they had dominion over them. Yet when they turned and cried to you, you heard from heaven, and many times you delivered them according to your mercies.
korean_text: 그들이 평강을 얻은 후에 다시 주 앞에서 악을 행하므로 주께서 그들을 원수들의 손에 버려 두사 원수들에게 지배를 당하게 하시다가 그들이 돌이켜 주께 부르짖으매 주께서 하늘에서 들으시고 여러 번 주의 긍휼로 건져내시고

sentences.original_text: they did evil again before you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신 앞에서 다시 악을 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: to the hand of their enemies
so that they had dominion over them
and many times you delivered them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여러 번 당신은 그들을 구원하셨습니다
